English
Teacher ("Mees") Kees and his class have to perform a play on stage in a
nearby elderly-home. Instead of performing the original play written by
the head mistress they decide to improvise, helped by some of the
inhabitants of the elderly home who enjoy the energy that the youth bring
to their home. In the mean time both Kees and his pupils in class have to
face exams.
